name: Leigh Woods woodland wander, Leigh Woods

ai.summary: Leigh Woods woodland wander is a gentle 2.9 km easy trail through Leigh Woods in the UK. The route offers a relaxing forest stroll suitable for families and casual hikers, with shaded paths and a mix of leaf litter and forest tracks.
ai.terrain_summary: The trail follows well-marked woodland paths with mostly flat or gently graded surfaces. Expect exposed roots and leaf litter, and sections that can be muddy after rain. There are short, gentle descents and ascents.
ai.safety_notes: - Stay on marked paths and respect wildlife. - Check the weather and wear sturdy footwear for uneven, potentially slippery surfaces. - Watch for slippery leaf litter and exposed roots, especially after rain. - Bring water; in the UK, weather can change quickly; carry layers and a light rain jacket. - Carry a map or offline navigation; tell someone your route. - Be mindful of ticks and insects; keep dogs under control if pets are allowed.
recommended_gear: Sturdy walking shoes or light hiking boots
Layered clothing and a lightweight rain jacket
Map or offline navigation on your phone
ai.best_seasons: Spring to Autumn; year-round visits possible with mud and weather considerations

seo.title: Leigh Woods Woodland Wander – Easy 2.9 km Hike in Leigh Woods, UK
seo.meta_description: Explore an easy 2.9 km woodland stroll in Leigh Woods, UK. Practical tips, terrain overview, safety guidance, and gear for a scenic forest hike.
